entities.name: prime minister
entities.description: The person in charge of the government. (Excerpt: 'Well, I hope we don’t see each other again, Prime Minister!')

entities.name: fudge
entities.description: A harassed-looking person who is a part of the government. (Excerpt: 'Less than a year later a harassed-looking Fudge had appeared out of thin air in the Cabinet Room')

entities.name: kwidditch world cup
entities.description: A sports event where magic is involved. (Excerpt: 'a spot of bother at the Kwidditch World Cup and that several Muggles had been ‘involved’')

entities.name: you-know-who's mark
entities.description: A symbol associated with a powerful entity. (Excerpt: 'the fact that You-Know-Who’s Mark had been seen again meant nothing')

entities.name: muggle liaison office
entities.description: An organization that deals with interactions between magic and non-magic people. (Excerpt: 'the Muggle Liaison Office was dealing with all memory modifications as they spoke')

entities.name: triwizard tournament
entities.description: A magical sports event where three schools compete against each other. (Excerpt: 'We’re importing three foreign dragons and a sphinx for the Triwizard Tournament')

entities.name: department for the regulation
entities.description: An organization that deals with regulations in the magical world. (Excerpt: 'the Department for the Regulation')

relationships.description: Fudge informed the Prime Minister about a spot of bother at the Kwidditch World Cup. (Excerpt: 'Fudge had appeared out of thin air in the Cabinet Room to inform the Prime Minister')
The Muggle Liaison Office is dealing with memory modifications related to You-Know-Who's Mark. (Excerpt: 'the Muggle Liaison Office was dealing with all memory modifications as they spoke')

The Department for the Regulation is importing three foreign dragons and a sphinx for the Triwizard Tournament. (Excerpt: 'We’re importing three foreign dragons and a sphinx for the Triwizard Tournament')
